translations: adj.预备性的，准备性的；<英>预备的，预料的

sentences.sentence: The preparatory work for the conference had been undertaken at two meetings of experts.
sentences.translation: 在两次专家会谈中，人们已经着手了会议的筹备工作。

sentences.sentence: We are pushing our kids to get good grades, take SAT preparatory courses and build resumes so they can get into the college of our first choice.
sentences.translation: 我们督促孩子取得好成绩、参加 SAT 预备课程、制作简历，这样他们就能进入到我们首选的大学。

sentences.sentence: To attach the preparatory to the senior school these three classes were known officially, on speech days and in reports, as upper, middle, and lower second.
sentences.translation: 作为高中的预备班，在演讲日和报告中，这三个班被正式称为上、中、下二班。
